subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Sarah Benedetti, who was raised in Connecticut and grew up as a UConn basketball fan, played for No. 16-seeded St. Francis in a game against the No. 1-seeded Huskies in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
